response.overview: On October 13, 1972, Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571, chartered to take a rugby team to Chile, crashes into a glacier in the heart of the Andes.
response.tagline: Based on a remarkable true story.
response.title: Society of the Snow

release_dates.note: Mar del Plata International Film Festival
